name: The Rainsdowne Players
description: A creativity-driven RPG about a rundown theatre and pleasing its unruly clientele. Help the Rainsdowne Players become the premier (and only!) theatre troupe in town!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
